name: HedgehogPlatformer
shortDescription: This is an extension for 360Â° movement platformer akin to the Sonic The Hedgehog games.
description: A platformer extension with unique physics that simulate the physics from Sonic The Hedgehog games but now in GDevelop, able to bring 360* movement with wall running and ceil attachment.
For documentation and usage visit: https://sites.google.com/view/hedgd/home

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manages and/or gives the physics & movements of the hedgehog platformer character (the players or npc's).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Hed_PlatformerCharacter

eventsFunctions.description: Executes the hedgehog physics in this frame.
eventsFunctions.name: HedgehogMovement
eventsFunctions.sentence: Execute hedgehog physics with _PARAM0_ as the platformer character and _PARAM2_ as the collision

parameters.description: The object that will act as solid for the hedgehog platformer
parameters.name: Platform

parameters.description: The hedgehog platform behavior attached to the previous object
parameters.name: PlatformBehavior

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is colliding with an specific object. This collision check is adapted to high speeds, but heavier.
eventsFunctions.name: IsCollidingWith

parameters.description: Ignore objects that are touching each other on their edges, but are not overlapping (default: no)
parameters.name: IgnoreOverlap

eventsFunctions.description: Draw the raycasts of the hedgehog platformer chararcter for debugging.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawRaycasts

eventsFunctions.description: Simulates the left key press.
eventsFunctions.name: Left

eventsFunctions.description: Simulates the right key press.
eventsFunctions.name: Right

eventsFunctions.description: Simulates the jump key press.
eventsFunctions.name: Jump

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the player can jump by being grounded or by extra jump on air.
eventsFunctions.name: CanJump

eventsFunctions.description: This action allows to jump on air when called, it is not a permanent effect so it has to be called whenever you want to allow the object to jump.
eventsFunctions.name: AllowExtraJump

eventsFunctions.description: Revokes the effect of "Allow jumping again". The object is made unable to jump while in mid air. This has no effect if the object is grounded.
eventsFunctions.name: ForbidExtraJump

eventsFunctions.description: This action cancels current jump, letting out all jump frames and removing any upwards velocity.
eventsFunctions.name: CancelJump

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the player is/has jumped.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJumping

eventsFunctions.description: Returns true if a wall collision is running.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPushing

eventsFunctions.description: Check if default controls are activated (use the simulation actions if deactivated).
eventsFunctions.name: DefaultControls

eventsFunctions.description: De/activate default controls (use the simulate actions if deactivated).
eventsFunctions.name: SetDefaultControls

eventsFunctions.description: Checks is a key is/has been simulated.
eventsFunctions.name: IsInput

eventsFunctions.description: the jump speed.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the amount of frames in which landing is unabled (and when variable speed jump can be applied).
eventsFunctions.name: JumpFrames

eventsFunctions.description: the max speed of the object while grounded.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the top speed of the object while grounded.
eventsFunctions.name: TopSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the max horizontal speed while airborne.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxXSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the top horizontal speed while airborne.
eventsFunctions.name: TopXSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the max vertical speed while airborne. (Affects jump speed).
eventsFunctions.name: MaxYSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the gravity of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Gravity

eventsFunctions.description: the amount of speed lost per frame when moving up in a slope.
eventsFunctions.name: UpSlopeFactor

eventsFunctions.description: the amount of speed obtained per frame when moving down in a slope.
eventsFunctions.name: DownSlopeFactor

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum angle to apply slope factors.
eventsFunctions.name: SlopeFactorAngle

eventsFunctions.description: the range of the rays casted on each side of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FloorRaycastRange

eventsFunctions.description: the range of the rays casted on each side of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFloorRaycastRange

eventsFunctions.description: the range of the rays casted on each side of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: CeilRaycastRange

eventsFunctions.description: the range of the rays casted on each side of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCeilRaycastRange

eventsFunctions.description: Returns true if the angle raycast is hitting the ground.
eventsFunctions.name: AngleRaycastHit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Angle raycast: _PARAM2_ of: _PARAM0_ is hitting collision

eventsFunctions.description: the floor detect range (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FloorDetectRange

eventsFunctions.description: the floor detect range (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFloorDetectRange

eventsFunctions.description: the floor magnet (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: FloorMagnet

eventsFunctions.description: the floor magnet (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFloorMagnet

eventsFunctions.description: De/activate the speed-based floor magnet.
eventsFunctions.name: UseSpeedFloorMagnet

eventsFunctions.description: the ceil detection range (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: CeilDetectRange

eventsFunctions.description: the ceil detection range (in pixels) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCeilDetectRange

eventsFunctions.description: the ceil angle of the object. Value is only obtained when the objects bumps onto the ceiling.
eventsFunctions.name: CeilAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Allows to maintain the ground angle (useful to launch from ramps, slopes, etc).
eventsFunctions.name: KeepGroundAngle

eventsFunctions.description: the movement/ground angle of the object. Value doesn't change until floor raycasts return a value.
eventsFunctions.name: GroundAngle

eventsFunctions.description: the direction (in degrees) in which the object is moving at.
eventsFunctions.name: SpeedAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object is on a floor (not in airborne state).
eventsFunctions.name: OnFloor

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the object platformer in airborne state.
eventsFunctions.name: SetOnAirborne

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: GroundSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetGroundSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the horizontal speed of the object (this speed can only be changed on airborne).
eventsFunctions.name: XSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetXSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the vertical speed of the object (this speed can only be changed on airborne).
eventsFunctions.name: YSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetYSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the acceleration per frame of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Acceleration

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetAcceleration

eventsFunctions.description: the friction per frame of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Friction

eventsFunctions.description: the ground speed of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFriction

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum ground angle in which the object will unattach is the minimum speed value is applied.
eventsFunctions.name: UnattachAngle

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum movement angle in which the object will unattach is the minimum speed value is applied.
eventsFunctions.name: SetUnattachAngle

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum movement speed in which the object will unattach is the minimum angle value is applied.
eventsFunctions.name: UnattachSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum movement speed in which the object will unattach is the minimum angle value is applied.
eventsFunctions.name: SetUnattachSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the Jump height divider.
eventsFunctions.name: JumpDivider

eventsFunctions.description: the variable jump height
eventsFunctions.name: SetJumpDivider

eventsFunctions.description: the bounce factor of ceil collision (0: Speed loss, 1: No speed loss, +1: Ceil sticking, -0: Ceil bounce).
eventsFunctions.name: CeilBounceFactor

eventsFunctions.description: the bounce factor of ceil collision (0: Speed loss, 1: No speed loss, +1: Ceil sticking, -0: Ceil bounce).
eventsFunctions.name: SetCeilBounceFactor

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object is under a ceiling.
eventsFunctions.name: UnderCeil

eventsFunctions.description: Use object points to cast the rays that calculate ground and ceil angles.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Use object point for angle raycast
eventsFunctions.name: CustomPoint
eventsFunctions.sentence: Object _PARAM0_ uses _PARAM3_ object point as a replacement of HedGD's point _PARAM2_ for physics

parameters.longDescription: Set it blank "" to remove point to use engine points.
parameters.name: CustomPoint

eventsFunctions.description: the time scale (hedgehog physics) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: TimeScale

propertyDescriptors.label: Default controls
propertyDescriptors.description: de/activate default controls (use the simulation actions if deactivated)
propertyDescriptors.name: DefaultControls

propertyDescriptors.label: Jump height divider (only works with jump frames)
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed gets divided by this value when jump input is not received after (or in the middle) of a jump
propertyDescriptors.name: JumpHeightDiv

propertyDescriptors.label: Jump frames (The amount of frames that unables landing after a jump)
propertyDescriptors.name: JumpFrames

propertyDescriptors.label: Max speed (affects X and Y speed on ground)
propertyDescriptors.description: The maximum speed while grounded
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Max horizontal speed (airborne)
propertyDescriptors.description: The maximum horizontal speed while airborne
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxXSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Max vertical speed (airborne)
propertyDescriptors.description: The maximum vertical speed while airborne
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxYSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Downwards slope factor
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed gain when moving downwards
propertyDescriptors.name: DownSlopeFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Upwards slope factor
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed loss when moving upwards
propertyDescriptors.name: UpSlopeFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Slope factor minimum angle
propertyDescriptors.description: In angles equal or higher, deceleration isn't applied, but slope factor values are instead
propertyDescriptors.name: SlopeFactorAngle

propertyDescriptors.label: Acceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed gained by key input
propertyDescriptors.name: Acceleration

propertyDescriptors.label: Friction
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed loss by no input (only in angles below slope factor angle)
propertyDescriptors.name: Friction

propertyDescriptors.label: Floor raycast range
propertyDescriptors.description: Range of rays casted on the object sides which returns the ground angle.
propertyDescriptors.name: FloorRaycastRange

propertyDescriptors.label: Ceil raycast range
propertyDescriptors.description: Range of rays casted on the object sides which returns the ceil angle.
propertyDescriptors.name: CeilRaycastRange

propertyDescriptors.label: Floor detection range
propertyDescriptors.description: Object position changes by this value, then checks if it's touching grass, then goes back to the original position.
propertyDescriptors.name: FloorDetectRange

propertyDescriptors.label: Floor magnet
propertyDescriptors.description: Object position changes by this value when it's grounded, to keep it grounded in a sudden high-speed slip.
propertyDescriptors.name: FloorMagnet

propertyDescriptors.label: Ceil detection range
propertyDescriptors.description: Object position changes by this value, then checks if it's touching a ceilling, then goes back to the original position.
propertyDescriptors.name: CeilDetectRange

propertyDescriptors.label: Minimum angle for ground unattach
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects with an equal or higher ground angle will unattach from the floor/ceiling (if the minimun speed is applied).
propertyDescriptors.name: UnattachMinimumAngle

propertyDescriptors.label: Minimum speed for ground unattach
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects with an equal or lower speed will unattach from the floor/ceiling if it's in the unattachment angle range (make it negative to unattach if you go too fast).
propertyDescriptors.name: UnattachMinimumSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Ceil bounce factor
propertyDescriptors.description: Applies a multiplication on the Y speed when hitting a ceiling (0: Speed loss, 1: No speed loss, +1: Ceil sticking, -0: Ceil bounce)
propertyDescriptors.name: CeilBounceFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Use forces
propertyDescriptors.description: Use trajectory based on forces, instead of pixels.
propertyDescriptors.name: Forces

propertyDescriptors.label: Top horizontal speed (airborne)
propertyDescriptors.description: The top horizontal speed in air obtained with input
propertyDescriptors.name: TopXspeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Top speed
propertyDescriptors.description: The top speed in ground obtained with input
propertyDescriptors.name: TopSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Speed-based floor magnet
propertyDescriptors.description: Reduces or increases floor magnet depending on object's current speed
propertyDescriptors.name: SpeedBasedMagnet

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manages and/or adds the collision of the hedgehog platformer (solid floor, walls and obstacles).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Hed_Platform

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a hedgehog object was/is stepping on this object in current frame (post-hedgehog movement).
eventsFunctions.name: OnFloor

parameters.description: The hedgehog platformer character behavior of the previos object
parameters.name: PlatformerBehavior

eventsFunctions.description: Check the obstacle mode of the hedgehog platform.
eventsFunctions.name: ObstacleMode

parameters.description: The obstacle mode of the object
parameters.name: ObstacleMode

eventsFunctions.description: Changes the obstacle mode of the hedgehog platform.
eventsFunctions.name: SetObstacleMode
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the obstacle mode of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

parameters.description: Change the obstacle mode of the object
parameters.name: ObstacleMode

propertyDescriptors.label: Obstacle mode
propertyDescriptors.description: The way this platform will behave towards hedgehog platformer characters
propertyDescriptors.name: ObstacleMode
